title: Initiate Corporate Cash Concentration
description: A treasury manager needs to sweep funds from multiple subsidiary accounts into a central concentration account.

tasks.description: Identify all subsidiary accounts and their current balances.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves a list of 5 subsidiary accounts and their respective balances.

tasks.description: Execute the pre-defined cash sweep to move all funds to the master account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully initiates the automated cash concentration process.

tasks.description: Confirm the final balance of the concentration account after the sweep is complete.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the new, higher balance in the master account.
